name: marlincdm_json_response_message
description: Marlin Content Decryption Module json response message for EME case

httpResponse.descripion: http response message. this property is required if message_type is httpResponse

statusCode.description: an integer specifying the HTTP response Status Code

headers.description: http header parameters. an array of one or more JSON objects

name.description: a string specifying the HTTP header name

value.description: a string specifying the HTTP header value

body.description: base64-encoded string containing the HTTP message body

queryResponse.description: queryRequest message. this property is required if message_type is queryRequest

value.description: The value of queried Marlin property

applicationError.descripion: applicationError message. this property is required if message_type is applicationError
